con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ReadLDAPEntry" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/pcbpel/adapter/ldap/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/ReadLDAPEntry" xmlns:tns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/pcbpel/adapter/ldap/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/ReadLDAPEntry" xmlns:jca="http://xmlns.oracle.com/pcbpel/wsdl/jca/" xmlns:plt="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/05/partner-link/" xmlns:imp1="http://platform.integration.oracle/blocks/adapter/fw/metadata/ReadLDAPEntry" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:documentation> <abstractWSDL>http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite!1.0/WSDLs/ReadLDAPEntry.wsdl</abstractWSDL> </wsdl:documentation> <plt:partnerLinkType name="search_plt"> <plt:role name="search_role"> <plt:portType name="tns:search_ptt"/> </plt:role> </plt:partnerLinkType> <wsdl:types> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <import namespace="http://platform.integration.oracle/blocks/adapter/fw/metadata/ReadLDAPEntry" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/ReadFromLDAP_2?XSD=../Schemas/ReadLDAPEntry.xsd"/> </schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="search_request_msg"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="imp1:searchRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="search_response_msg"> <wsdl:part name="body" element="imp1:searchResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="search_ptt"> <wsdl:operation name="search"> <wsdl:input message="tns:search_request_msg"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:search_response_msg"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="search_pttBinding" type="tns:search_ptt"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="search"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="search"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ReadFromLDAP"> <wsdl:port name="search_pt" binding="tns:search_pttBinding"> <soap:address location="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/ReadFromLDAP_2"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://platform.integration.oracle/blocks/adapter/fw/metadata/ReadLDAPEntry" elementFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://platform.integration.oracle/blocks/adapter/fw/metadata/ReadLDAPEntry"> <element name="searchRequest"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="baseDN" type="string" default="ou=ExternalStaff,o=saibot.airport"/> <element name="searchFilter" type="string" default="(objectClass=*)"/> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <element name="searchResponse"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="entriesReturned" type="string" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="referral" type="anyURI" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <element name="searchResultEntry" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"> <complexType> <sequence> <element name="employeeNumber" type="string"/> <element name="mail" type="tns:multiValueAttribute"/> <element name="manager" type="tns:multiValueAttribute"/> <element name="mobile" type="tns:multiValueAttribute"/> <element name="ou" type="tns:multiValueAttribute"/> </sequence> <attribute name="index" type="integer"/> <attribute name="dn" type="string"/> </complexType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </element> <complexType name="multiValueAttribute"> <sequence> <element name="value" type="string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<wsdl:definitions name="LdapService" targetNamespace="http://oracle.com/sca/soapservice/LDAPAccessor/LDAPAccessor/LdapService" xmlns:tns="http://oracle.com/sca/soapservice/LDAPAccessor/LDAPAccessor/LdapService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sec="saibot.airport/security" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:documentation> <abstractWSDL>http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite!1.0/WSDLs/LdapService.wsdl</abstractWSDL> </wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="saibot.airport/security" schemaLocation="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/LDAPService?XSD=../Schemas/LdapService.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="requestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="sec:UserAccountRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="findUserRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="sec:FindUserAccountRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="findUserResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="part1" element="sec:FindUserAccountResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="LdapService"> <wsdl:operation name="addUserAccount"> <wsdl:input message="tns:requestMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="findUserAccount"> <wsdl:input message="tns:findUserRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:findUserResponseMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="LdapServiceBinding" type="tns:LdapService"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="addUserAccount"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="addUserAccount"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="findUserAccount"> <soap:operation style="document" soapAction="findUserAccount"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="LDAPService"> <wsdl:port name="LdapService_pt" binding="tns:LdapServiceBinding"> <soap:address location="http://soa2admin2.example.com:8001/soa-infra/services/default/LDAPInteractorSOAComposite/LDAPService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="saibot.airport/security" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="saibot.airport/security" xmlns:sec="saibot.airport/security"> <xsd:element name="UserAccountRequest" type="sec:userAccount"/> <xsd:element name="FindUserAccountRequest" type="sec:userAccountSearchDetails"/> <xsd:element name="FindUserAccountResponse" type="sec:userAccount"/> <xsd:complexType name="userAccountSearchDetails"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UserId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="userAccount"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="UserId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="GivenName" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Password" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="EmailAddress" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="EmployeeNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="OrganizationUnit" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="ManagerId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="MobileTelephone" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
